pr_title: Improve editing domain's handling of Non-DVLM Models

timeline.message:
Add save all option to only save DVLM resources from builders

- Add a option to only save DVLM resources in the editing domain
- Add option in transactional builders to uses this new saveAll option
if the builder only works with DVLM resources
- Update inheritance and equation builder to only save DVLM resources
Make default behavior to not save non-DVLM resources - (Task #562)
Add documentation for new saveAll option - (Task #562)
Add test for handling of external models - (Task #562)

timeline.author: andriikovalov-dlr

timeline.bodyText: Let's move repetitive code into a method like doExternalChange()
timeline.author: andriikovalov-dlr

timeline.message: Move external change to dedicated model - (Task #562)
